body_html: Here's one reason: people sometimes want to e.g. enlarge the output size, and this allows them to replace the weights. You can always add an assert that the weights you assign have the same shape if you want to be safe. Thanks for the suggestion, but closing as wontfix.
body_text: Here's one reason: people sometimes want to e.g. enlarge the output size, and this allows them to replace the weights. You can always add an assert that the weights you assign have the same shape if you want to be safe. Thanks for the suggestion, but closing as wontfix.
body: Here's one reason: people sometimes want to e.g. enlarge the output size, and this allows them to replace the weights. You can always add an assert that the weights you assign have the same shape if you want to be safe. Thanks for the suggestion, but closing as wontfix.
